DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study RVSTAR evaluate whether echocardiographic criterion explore right ventricle predict inefficacy and/or unsafeness recruitment maneuver patient suffer acute respiratory distress syndrome
DOC.brief_title: Echocardiography Predictive Inefficacy and/or Unsafeness Recruitment Maneuvers Patients With Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome .
DOC.criteria: Endotracheal mechanical ventilation acute hypoxemic respiratory failure last one week le A ratio partial pressure arterial oxygen ( PaO2 measure millimeter mercury ) fraction inspire oxygen ( FiO2 unitless ) 300 mmHg less inspired fraction oxygen FiO2 50 % A positive endexpiratory pressure 5 cm water high A tidal volume 6 8 ml per kilogram predict body weight Bilateral opacity chest radiography fully explain effusion , lobar/lung collapse , nodules Respiratory failure fully explain cardiac failure ï¬‚uid overload Written inform consent Adult patient least 18 year age Ventilatory criterion ( PaO2/FiO2 300 mmHg less Positive End Expiratory Pressure 5 cm water high ) radiologic criterion ( Bilateral opacities chest radiography fully explain effusion , lobar/lung collapse , nodule ) last 24 hour Endotracheal mechanical ventilation acute hypoxemic respiratory failure last one week Age young 18 year old No write informed consent Known pregnancy and/or breastfeed Increased intracranial pressure A ratio partial pressure arterial oxygen ( PaO2 measure millimeter mercury ) fraction inspire oxygen ( FiO2 unitless ) high 300 mmHg Positive end expiratory pressure le 5 mmHg Ventilatory criterion ( PaO2/FiO2 300 mmHg less Positive End Expiratory Pressure 5 cm water high ) radiologic criterion ( Bilateral opacities chest radiography fully explain effusion , lobar/lung collapse , nodule ) last less 24 hour Severe chronic respiratory disease require longterm oxygen therapy mechanical ventilation home Severe chronic liver disease Barotrauma pneumothorax Hemodynamic failure need 3 milligram per hour noradrenalin and/or 2 milligram per hour adrenalin rise dos vasopressor and/or vascular fill exceed 500 milliliter precede hour Arrhythmias : ventricular tachycardia , ventricular fibrillation , third degree atrioventricular block Atrial fibrillation
